Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.docstore.driver.codec

Interface Encoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
AliEncoder, AliEncoder.ListEncoder, AliEncoder.MapEncoder, AwsEncoder, AwsEncoder.ListEncoder, AwsEncoder.MapEncoder, FSEncoder, FSEncoder.ListEncoder, FSEncoder.MapEncoder, SpannerEncoder, SpannerEncoder.ListEncoder, SpannerEncoder.MapEncoder
public interface Encoder
Encoder defines methods for encoding various data types into a target format. It supports encoding null values, primitive types (booleans, strings, integers, floats), byte arrays, lists, and maps. Implementations of this interface are responsible for serializing the encoded data. The providers need to provide the encoding implementations for encoding the native data types to the provider/substrate specific format.
